label: cascading_failure_01_ep_025
content:
## 2024-02-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 158900 | p50: 210ms p95: 570ms p99: 1100ms | err: 3.4% (5400 errors) | success: 96.6%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 158400 | p50: 185ms p95: 500ms p99: 860ms | err: 0.95% (1500 errors) | success: 99.05%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 153900 | p50: 350ms p95: 700ms p99: 860ms | err: 0.44% (680 errors) | success: 99.56%
- /auth: REQUESTS 206100 | p50: 50ms p95: 130ms p99: 245ms | err: 0.17% (360 errors) | success: 99.83%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 277400 | p50: 65ms p95: 198ms p99: 365ms | err: 0.17% (460 errors) | success: 99.83%
- /search: REQUESTS 242200 | p50: 88ms p95: 245ms p99: 440ms | err: 0.26% (620 errors) | success: 99.74%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 196100 | p50: 112ms p95: 320ms p99: 560ms | err: 0.31% (600 errors) | success: 99.69%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 76% | Mem 82% | Disk 63% | Conns: 6900 | Net: 740/900 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 73% | Mem 80% | Disk 62% | Conns: 6720 | Net: 720/875 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 80% | Mem 83% | Disk 61% | Conns: 7200 | Net: 760/890 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 50% | Mem 82% | Disk 88% | Conns: 450 | Net: 190/232 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 248 | idle 12 | waiting 320 | exhaustion: 38 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 240ms
- replica: active 96 | idle 4 | waiting 70 | exhaustion: 12 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 70ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 240 | exhaustion: 48 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 390ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.7% | Bandwidth: 9.7 Gbps | Origin requests: 508200

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=third_party_geo events=48 waiting=240
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-02: error_pct=3.40

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 50% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Reduced /checkout max in-flight requests from 1200 to 900 (gateway)
- Vendor status page update received for geo provider

### On-Call
- Shift: E. Johnson. 16 pages. 5 tickets (GW-412 in-flight cap, CO-882, POOL-649, VEND-124, FF-110). Status: Mitigating.
